subject: ATTENTION ATTENTION ORDER NEEDS ATTENTIOM
description_text:
HI I'M JOSHUA SILVESTRI I'M MENTALLY ILL PERSON WHO BOUGHT YOUR PRO HAPTIC
FEEDBACK FOR SIM RACING PEDALS. I DRIVE IN SIM RACING BECAUSE I CAN'T

HAPTIC FEEDBACK DEVICES BECAUSE I WATCHED A VIDEO AND IT JUST SEEMED LIKE
YOUR DESIGN OF THE INSIDE OF THE DEVICE WITH THE WEIGHTED PISTON SURROUNDED
BY BEARING WALLS IS A GREAT FOR SIGHT FOR RELIABILITY AND LONG LASTING
WITHOUT BREAKDOWN OR UNMECCASSRY WEAR AND TEAR.NUT I DID NOTICE IN THE
PICTURE OF WHAT I BOUGHT THAT IT SHOWS TWO DIFFERENT STYLES OF BRACKET IN
THE TWO PRO DEVICES BUT IN THE THREE PRO DEVICE IT SHOWED 3 OF THE SAME
BRACKET.I WAS HOPING YOU COULD INCLUDE 2 OF EACH OF 2 BRACKETS SO I CAN SEE
WHICH ONE WILL WORK WITH MY PURCHASE BECAUSE I'M ALSO GETTING A INVERTED
PEDAL BOX FOR MY PEDALS
I BOUGHT YOUR DEVICES AND THE POWER PLUG AND THE DATA BOX FROM AMAZON
 ORDER #
112-1609892-6399442
I also included screenshots of my purchase.please help me with this request
I'd really appreciate the help you could give it will be very helpful and
I'll be sure to write review and include how you went the extra mile to
